item.description:
Did you know that there's a Champions in Kendall Square? :D WHOO HOO!!

Let's all gather to watch the next Patriots/Steelers game this Sunday.  4:15pm is game time, but I should be there about 3pm or so.  Champions is a busy place so seating may be limited.  I'm going to try to get us a group of tables but NO PROMISES. 

Check out www.championscambridge.com to take a gander at their menu.  PLEASE REMEMBER THAT YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR OWN FOOD AND DRINK.  Please maintain a separate tab or pay as you go. 

Champions is incredibly conveniently located at the MIT/Kendall Sq Red Line stop in Cambridge.  There is also a pay parking garage located within the Cambridge Center/Marriott Hotel.

This event is cross-listed with Boston Happy Hour.  DON YOUR GEAR AND COME ON DOWN! :D
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and will be wearing a Welker jersey.
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party
